relationships.description: Ron commented on Angelina's age, saying 'can't see a beard, can you?'
Harry asked if someone was seventeen years old.
Hermione wished Angelina good luck in the competition, saying 'I really hope you get it, Angelina!'
Seamus made a comment about Pretty-Boy Diggory, causing other Hufflepuffs to scowl at him.
